tool_description: Recommends optimal water collection techniques and tools based on source characteristics and available equipment for maximum efficiency and safety.

source_type.description: Water source: flowing_stream, still_pond, rock_pool, spring, seep, dew, rainwater

source_accessibility.description: Access difficulty: easy, moderate, difficult, dangerous

volume_needed_liters.description: Target water volume in liters (0.5 to 100)

time_available_minutes.description: Available time for collection (5 to 480 minutes)

weather_conditions.description: Current weather: clear, cloudy, light_rain, heavy_rain, snow, windy

group_size.description: Number of people available for collection (1 to 20)

safety_priority.description: Safety emphasis: low, standard, high, maximum

error_messages: Invalid source type: Use one of [flowing_stream, still_pond, rock_pool, spring, seep, dew, rainwater].
Invalid accessibility: Use one of [easy, moderate, difficult, dangerous].
Volume out of range: Volume needed must be between 0.5 and 100 liters.
Time out of range: Available time must be between 5 and 480 minutes.
Invalid weather condition: Use one of [clear, cloudy, light_rain, heavy_rain, snow, windy].
Group size out of range: Group size must be between 1 and 20 people.
Invalid safety priority: Use one of [low, standard, high, maximum].
Empty containers array: Must specify at least one available container.
usage: Describe the water source, accessibility, available equipment, volume needs, and time constraints. Include weather and group size for more precise recommendations.

efficiency_rating.description: Method efficiency: excellent, good, moderate, poor
